dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S420 IS: Dairy Business Innovation Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Baldwin (for herself and Mrs. Blackburn) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 to reauthorize the dairy business innovation initiatives.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Dairy Business Innovation Act of 2025.
Section 12513(i) of the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 (7 U.S.C. 1632d(i)) is amended by striking $20,000,000 and inserting $36,000,000.
